page.title: 10Children's getups+bedtimes
page.content:
We did a survey of 11 year olds to see what time they got up and what time they went to bed on Saturday 1st June. These are the results: The earliest {get up} was 4.00 a.m. The latest {get up} was 11.40 a.m. The earliest {bedtime} was 9.15 p.m. The latest {bedtime} was 1.00 a.m.
The average {get up} was 8.30 a.m. The average {bedtime} was 9.30.p.m.
The most {time asleep} was 13h.20m. The least {time asleep} was 6h.30m.
The most {time awake} was 17h.30m. The least {time awake} was 10h.40m.
We seem to be pretty normal !
